creator: Akash App Maker
descriptionHtml:
One can easily translate Malayalam text to Bengali and translate Bengali text to Malayalam by using our free Malayalam to Bengali translation application.

* Using the inbuilt speak functionality, you can listen to the words or sentences. Click on the speaker and the application will read the Bengali words/sentences. Malayalam words/sentences will also be read in the application.

* You can type your words in Bengali and get exact words in Malayalam. You can type your words in Malayalam and get exact words in Bengali.

* This Free translator can quickly translate from Bengali to Malayalam and Malayalam to Bengali words as well as complete sentences. Instant translation and the full validity of the words.

* Using the inbuilt voice recognition technology, you can type your text using your voice and then translate the text. This convenient feature allows you to translate regular conversations. You can translate your Bengali voice to Malayalam and Malayalam voice to Bengali.

* If you are a student, tourist or traveler, it will helps you to learn the Bengali or Malayalam language.

* Translate words and sentences.

* This application will be very useful to people studying a foreign language (students , travelers and everyone who raise their level of language.)

Usage Guide

How do I use it as Malayalam to Bengali Translator ?

First enter text in text box and click on 'Translate' and our Application will translate your Malayalam text into Bengali.

How do I use it as a Bengali to Malayalam Translator ?

First enter text in text box and click on 'Translate' and our Application will translate your Bengali text into Malayalam.

How to change language?

Click on the language button in whichever language you want to translate your sentence. If you want to translate Malayalam sentence into Bengali language, then you have to click on Bengali button. Along with this, if you want to translate Bengali sentence into Malayalam language, then you have to click on the button of Malayalam.

key features of Malayalam to Bengali Translator Application :

1. Bengali to Malayalam Translator / Malayalam to Bengali Translator.

2. Voice Typing in Bengali. Voice translation from Bengali to Malayalam.

3. Voice Typing in Malayalam. Voice translation from Malayalam to Bengali.

4. You can copy any translated sentence, you have been given the option of copying it separately.

5. you can share your translation result into your social media like facebook, twitter, whatsapp, hangouts, messaging, email, line, wechat and other social media applications installed on your mobile phone.

6. Malayalam to Bengali Application consumes very less memory.

7. Malayalam to Bengali Translator Super Fast.

Thank you for using our Malayalam to Bengali Translator Application..

Tip: You can also use this app as Bengali to Malayalam Translator Application.

For any issues/queries/feedback/suggestions regarding our Malayalam to Bengali Translator Application, please reach us at playconsoleakash@gmail.com , we will be happy to contact you.
